data.description: About NewsBreak Founded in 2015, NewsBreak is the Content Intelligence platform shaping the future content economy. With over 40 million monthly active users, our flagship platform delivers highly personalized local news and information powered by advanced AI, recommendation systems, and adtech. Recognized by Fast Company as #32 on the Top Workplaces for Innovators, we're proud to be Great Place to Work® certified and home to a dynamic team of technologists, product innovators, and business leaders who are passionate about solving meaningful challenges at scale. Together, we reached unicorn status in 2021, and we remain committed to continuing this high-growth trajectory with the right team to fulfill our mission: building the infrastructure layer for content intelligence. If you’re inspired to dream big, innovate fast, and make a difference, we’d love to hear from you! For more information, visit www.newsbreak.com/aboutLocation: Mountain View, CACommitment: On-siteDuration: 12 weeks starting in early 2026Conversion Opportunity: High-performing interns will be evaluated for full-time offers About the Program We're launching our 2025 Engineering Internship Program, a fast-paced, high-impact opportunity designed for aspiring engineers who want to build real products, ship meaningful features, and accelerate their path into a full-time role. Over the course of 12 weeks, you’ll work closely with experienced engineers, gain hands-on mentorship, contribute directly to production systems, and help solve real challenges across NewsBreak's ecosystem. This is a paid, on-site internship based in our Mountain View headquarters. Top-performing interns will be considered for full-time offers at the conclusion of the program. Highlighted Projects： You will be matched to a team based on skills, interests, and business needs. Sample projects include: MSP Monetization – Mountain View, CA MSP is our next-generation, AI-powered monetization platform that empowers publishers to unlock their full revenue potential with unmatched transparency and control. It combines intelligent optimization, real-time insights, and seamless ad management to help publishers confidently scale their business and maximize long-term growth. Newsletter Systems – Mountain View, CA Aigeon.ai is an exciting new product built by NewsBreak, the leading platform for local news and information serving tens of millions of users across the United States. Aigeon is reimagining the newsletter and content-monetization space via AI: simplifying creation, audience growth, and monetization of newsletters for content creators and small media brands. NBot – Mountain View, CA Drive the optimization of conversational experiences that power our next-generation news recommendation engine, enabling more personalized, intuitive, and intelligent user interactions. AI Initiatives – Mountain View, CA This initiative explores cutting-edge NLP, generative AI, and multimodal technologies to power the next generation of content intelligence. The project includes building AI-driven content generation capabilities that significantly expand the content supply while enhancing accuracy, quality, and user relevance. The goal is to create scalable AI systems that deliver meaningful impact to tens of millions of NewsBreak users. Foundational Requirements: Currently in the final semester of a Master’s or PhD program in Computer Science (or a closely related field), or recently graduated from a top-tier university. Strong proficiency in at least one major programming language (e.g., Python, Java, C++, Go). Preferred Qualifications: Coursework, academic research, or hands-on projects in Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, NLP, Recommendation Systems, or Large Language Models Experience using ML frameworks and tools (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow, scikit-learn) Familiarity with data pipelines, model training, or evaluating ML models Prior internships or project experience involving ML-powered features, AI agents, or AIGC systems We’re seeking builders with diverse technical backgrounds, whether you’re a full stack engineer, machine learning engineer, or mobile engineer, who are excited to solve real problems with cutting-edge AI technologies. If you’re passionate about the latest advancements in AI, have built your own apps or projects, or naturally think with an entrepreneurial, ownership-driven mindset, you’ll thrive in this program. We value candidates who are curious, hands-on, and eager to turn ideas into impact.CPRA Privacy Notice for California Candidates
